subject: Re: Any eBay sellers willing to do this?
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Either that, or anyone willing to make them for $25 + shipping with 
no profit?  You could then list them just like the ones that are 
selling...so they pull up identical to the listings that are up 
there.  :)

LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "itcdeadpeople" <ITCdeadpeople@...> 
wrote:
>
> I was thinking if someone would list a FREE DOWNLOAD of 
instructions for the various hacks 
> on the Radio Shack units, it could put an end to the business for 
sellers that are taking 
> advantage of people who are unaware that they could probably hack 
the units for 
> themselves.  
> 
> I have seen "downloads" of various things listed before.  Why not 
this?
> 
> Margaret
>
